TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Stopwatch extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供一組方法和屬性，您可以使用這些方法和屬性，精確地測量已耗用時間。

span.span: Provides a set of methods and properties that you can use to accurately measure elapsed time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A執行個體可以跨多個間隔一個間隔，或經過時間的總計中測量已耗用時間。A instance can measure elapsed time for one interval, or the total of elapsed time across multiple intervals. 在典型案例中，您呼叫方法，最後呼叫方法，然後檢查 經過時間使用屬性。In a typical scenario, you call the method, then eventually call the method, and then you check elapsed time using the property. A執行個體已執行或完全停止，請改用來判斷目前的狀態。A instance is either running or stopped; use to determine the current state of a . 使用開始測量已耗用時間; 使用停止測量已耗用時間。Use to begin measuring elapsed time; use to stop measuring elapsed time. 查詢透過屬性的已耗用時間值， ，或。Query the elapsed time value through the properties , , or . 執行中或已停止執行個體時，您可以查詢經過的時間屬性。You can query the elapsed time properties while the instance is running or stopped. 屬性會穩定地增加的經過時間而是執行中; 它們保持不變時，執行個體停止。The elapsed time properties steadily increase while the is running; they remain constant when the instance is stopped. 根據預設，經過時間值的的執行個體等於所有的測量的時間間隔的總和。By default, the elapsed time value of a instance equals the total of all measured time intervals. 每次呼叫開始計算累積的經過時間; 在每次呼叫結束目前的時間間隔測量並凍結累積的經過時間值。Each call to begins counting at the cumulative elapsed time; each call to ends the current interval measurement and freezes the cumulative elapsed time value. 使用方法，以清除所累積的經過時間，以將現有執行個體。Use the method to clear the cumulative elapsed time in an existing instance. 透過計算基礎計時器機制中的計時器刻度為單位測量已耗用時間。The measures elapsed time by counting timer ticks in the underlying timer mechanism. 如果已安裝的硬體和作業系統支援高解析度效能計數器，然後在類別會使用該 計數器來測量已耗用時間。If the installed hardware and operating system support a high-resolution performance counter, then the class uses that counter to measure elapsed time. 否則，類別會使用測量已耗用時間的系統計時器。Otherwise, the class uses the system timer to measure elapsed time. 使用和欄位，以決定的有效位數和解決方案計時實作。Use the and fields to determine the precision and resolution of the timing implementation. 類別可協助 managed 程式碼中的時間相關的效能計數器的操作。The class assists the manipulation of timing-related performance counters within managed code. 具體來說，欄位和方法可用來代替 unmanaged 的 Win32 Api`QueryPerformanceFrequency`和`QueryPerformanceCounter`。Specifically, the field and method can be used in place of the unmanaged Win32 APIs `QueryPerformanceFrequency` and `QueryPerformanceCounter`. > [!NOTE] > 在多處理器電腦上，並不重要的執行緒執行哪一個處理器。On a multiprocessor computer, it does not matter which processor the thread runs on. 不過，由於 BIOS 或硬體抽象層 (HAL) 中的 bug，您可以不同處理器上取得不同的計時結果。However, because of bugs in the BIOS or the Hardware Abstraction Layer (HAL), you can get different timing results on different processors. 若要指定執行緒的處理器親和性，使用方法。To specify processor affinity for a thread, use the method. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用類別，以判斷應用程式的執行時間。The following example demonstrates how to use the class to determine the execution time for an application. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.Stopwatch/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.Stopwatch/VB/source.vb#1)] 下列範例示範如何使用類別計算的效能資料。The following example demonstrates the use of the class to calculate performance data. [!code-cpp[StopWatchPerfSample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StopWatchPerfSample/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[StopWatchPerfSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StopWatchPerfSample/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[StopWatchPerfSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/StopWatchPerfSample/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回停止執行個體，和執行個體的已耗用時間屬性為零。The returned instance is stopped, and the elapsed time property of the instance is zero. 使用方法開始測量已耗用時間，與新執行個體。Use the method to begin measuring elapsed time with the new instance. 使用方法來初始化新執行個體，並立即啟動它。Use the method to initialize a new instance and immediately start it. ## Examples 下列範例會初始化使用簡單的類別建構函式的執行個體。The following example initializes a instance by using a simple class constructor. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.Stopwatch/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.Stopwatch/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Elapsed As TimeSpan
public: property TimeSpan Elapsed { TimeSpan get(); };

summary.span: 取得目前執行個體所測量的已耗用時間總和。

span.span: Gets the total elapsed time measured by the current instance.

value.span: 表示目前執行個體所測量之已耗用時間總和的唯讀 。

span.span: A read-only representing the total elapsed time measured by the current instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在典型案例中，您呼叫方法，最後呼叫方法，然後檢查 經過時間使用屬性。In a typical scenario, you call the method, then eventually call the method, and then you check elapsed time using the property. 使用屬性，以擷取所經過的時間值使用方法和屬性。Use the property to retrieve the elapsed time value using methods and properties. 例如，您可以格式化傳回文字表示法中，執行個體，或將它傳遞至另一個類別，需要參數。For example, you can format the returned instance into a text representation, or pass it to another class that requires a parameter. 您可以查詢的內容， ，和時執行個體正在執行或已停止。You can query the properties , , and while the instance is running or stopped. 屬性會穩定地增加的經過時間而是執行中; 它們保持不變時，執行個體停止。The elapsed time properties steadily increase while the is running; they remain constant when the instance is stopped. 根據預設，經過時間值的的執行個體等於所有的測量的時間間隔的總和。By default, the elapsed time value of a instance equals the total of all measured time intervals. 每次呼叫開始計算累積的經過時間; 在每次呼叫結束目前的時間間隔測量並凍結累積的經過時間值。Each call to begins counting at the cumulative elapsed time; each call to ends the current interval measurement and freezes the cumulative elapsed time value. 使用方法，以清除所累積的經過時間，以將現有執行個體。Use the method to clear the cumulative elapsed time in an existing instance. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來判斷應用程式的執行時間。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the execution time for an application. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.Stopwatch/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.Stopwatch/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ElapsedMilliseconds As Long
public: property long ElapsedMilliseconds { long get(); };

summary.span: 取得目前執行個體所測量的已耗用時間總和，以毫秒為單位。

span.span: Gets the total elapsed time measured by the current instance, in milliseconds.

value.span: 表示目前執行個體所測量之毫秒總數的唯讀長整數 (Long Integer)。

span.span: A read-only long integer representing the total number of milliseconds measured by the current instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性代表經過時間無條件捨去到最接近的整數毫秒值。This property represents elapsed time rounded down to the nearest whole millisecond value. 為更高的精確度度量，使用或屬性。For higher precision measurements, use the or properties. 您可以查詢的內容， ，和時執行個體正在執行或已停止。You can query the properties , , and while the instance is running or stopped. 屬性會穩定地增加的經過時間而是執行中; 它們保持不變時，執行個體停止。The elapsed time properties steadily increase while the is running; they remain constant when the instance is stopped. 根據預設，經過時間值的的執行個體等於所有的測量的時間間隔的總和。By default, the elapsed time value of a instance equals the total of all measured time intervals. 每次呼叫開始計算累積的經過時間; 在每次呼叫結束目前的時間間隔測量並凍結累積的經過時間值。Each call to begins counting at the cumulative elapsed time; each call to ends the current interval measurement and freezes the cumulative elapsed time value. 使用方法，以清除所累積的經過時間，以將現有執行個體。Use the method to clear the cumulative elapsed time in an existing instance. ## Examples 下列範例會使用類別，以測量效能的四個不同的實作，剖析字串的整數。The following example uses the class to measure the performance of four different implementations for parsing an integer from a string. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[StopWatchPerfSample#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StopWatchPerfSample/CPP/source.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[StopWatchPerfSample#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StopWatchPerfSample/CS/source.cs#3)] [!code-vb[StopWatchPerfSample#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/StopWatchPerfSample/VB/source.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ElapsedTicks As Long
public: property long ElapsedTicks { long get(); };

summary.span: 取得目前執行個體所測量的已耗用時間總和，以計時器刻度為單位。

span.span: Gets the total elapsed time measured by the current instance, in timer ticks.

value.span: 表示目前執行個體所測量之計時器刻度總數的唯讀長整數。

span.span: A read-only long integer representing the total number of timer ticks measured by the current instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性表示基礎計時器機制中的計時器刻度數目。This property represents the number of elapsed ticks in the underlying timer mechanism. 刻度是最小時間單位，計時器可以測量。A tick is the smallest unit of time that the timer can measure. 使用欄位轉換值的秒數。Use the field to convert the value into a number of seconds. 您可以查詢的內容， ，和時執行個體正在執行或已停止。You can query the properties , , and while the instance is running or stopped. 屬性會穩定地增加的經過時間而是執行中; 它們保持不變時，執行個體停止。The elapsed time properties steadily increase while the is running; they remain constant when the instance is stopped. 根據預設，經過時間值的的執行個體等於所有的測量的時間間隔的總和。By default, the elapsed time value of a instance equals the total of all measured time intervals. 每次呼叫開始計算累積的經過時間; 在每次呼叫結束目前的時間間隔測量並凍結累積的經過時間值。Each call to begins counting at the cumulative elapsed time; each call to ends the current interval measurement and freezes the cumulative elapsed time value. 使用方法，以清除所累積的經過時間，以將現有執行個體。Use the method to clear the cumulative elapsed time in an existing instance. > [!NOTE] > 刻度會與不同。 ticks are different from . 中的每個刻度值代表一個 100 奈秒間隔。Each tick in the value represents one 100-nanosecond interval. 中的每個刻度值代表時間間隔等於 1 秒除以。Each tick in the value represents the time interval equal to 1 second divided by the . ## Examples 下列範例會使用類別，以測量效能的四個不同的實作，剖析字串的整數。The following example uses the class to measure the performance of four different implementations for parsing an integer from a string. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[StopWatchPerfSample#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StopWatchPerfSample/CPP/source.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[StopWatchPerfSample#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StopWatchPerfSample/CS/source.cs#4)] [!code-vb[StopWatchPerfSample#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/StopWatchPerfSample/VB/source.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Frequency As Long

summary.span: 取得計時器頻率，做為每秒的刻度數。

span.span: Gets the frequency of the timer as the number of ticks per second.
This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 計時器頻率表示計時器精確度和解析度。The timer frequency indicates the timer precision and resolution. 例如，2 百萬個的計時器頻率刻度每第二個等於每個刻度 500 奈秒的計時器解析。For example, a timer frequency of 2 million ticks per second equals a timer resolution of 500 nanoseconds per tick. 換句話說，一秒等於 1 億奈秒，因為每秒 2 百萬個刻度的計時器頻率就相當於 2 百萬個刻度每 1 億奈秒，可以進一步簡化以每秒 500 奈秒的 1 刻度。In other words, because one second equals 1 billion nanoseconds, a timer frequency of 2 million ticks per second is equivalent to 2 million ticks per 1 billion nanoseconds, which can be further simplified to 1 tick per 500 nanoseconds. 值取決於基礎計時機制的解析度。The value depends on the resolution of the underlying timing mechanism. 如果已安裝的硬體和作業系統支援高解析度效能計數器，然後在值會反映該計數器的頻率。If the installed hardware and operating system support a high-resolution performance counter, then the value reflects the frequency of that counter. 否則，值為基礎的系統計時器頻率。Otherwise, the value is based on the system timer frequency. 因為頻率取決於已安裝的硬體和作業系統，系統執行時的值會維持不變。Because the frequency depends on the installed hardware and operating system, the value remains constant while the system is running. ## Examples 下列範例顯示的頻率和解決方案計時器。The following example displays the frequency and resolution of a timer. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[StopWatchPerfSample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StopWatchPerfSample/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[StopWatchPerfSample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StopWatchPerfSample/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[StopWatchPerfSample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/StopWatchPerfSample/VB/source.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig int64 GetTimestamp() cil managed
Public Shared Function GetTimestamp () As Long

summary.span: 取得計時器機制中的目前刻度數。

span.span: Gets the current number of ticks in the timer mechanism.

returns.span: 表示基礎計時器機制之刻度計數器值的長整數。

span.span: A long integer representing the tick counter value of the underlying timer mechanism.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果類別會使用高解析度效能計數器，傳回該計數器的目前值。If the class uses a high-resolution performance counter, returns the current value of that counter. 如果類別會使用系統計時器，傳回目前屬性執行個體。If the class uses the system timer, returns the current property of the instance. ## Examples 下列範例說明使用方法，以更新效能計數器。The following example illustrates the use of the method to update a performance counter. [!code-cpp[PerformanceCounterType.ElapsedTime#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerformanceCounterType.ElapsedTime/CPP/elapsedtime.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[PerformanceCounterType.ElapsedTime#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerformanceCounterType.ElapsedTime/CS/elapsedtime.cs#2)] [!code-vb[PerformanceCounterType.ElapsedTime#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerformanceCounterType.ElapsedTime/VB/elapsedtime.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly IsHighResolution As Boolean

summary.span: 指示計時器是否以高解析度效能計數器為基礎。

span.span: Indicates whether the timer is based on a high-resolution performance counter.
This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所使用的計時器類別取決於系統硬體和作業系統。The timer used by the class depends on the system hardware and operating system. 是`true`如果計時器為基礎的高解析度效能計數器。 is `true` if the timer is based on a high-resolution performance counter. 否則，是`false`，這表示計時器為基礎的系統計時器。Otherwise, is `false`, which indicates that the timer is based on the system timer. ## Examples 下列範例顯示的頻率和解決方案計時器。The following example displays the frequency and resolution of a timer. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[StopWatchPerfSample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StopWatchPerfSample/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[StopWatchPerfSample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StopWatchPerfSample/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[StopWatchPerfSample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/StopWatchPerfSample/VB/source.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsRunning As Boolean
public: property bool IsRunning { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，表示 計時器是否執行中。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the timer is running.

value.span: 如果 執行個體目前執行中並正在測量間隔的已耗用時間，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the instance is currently running and measuring elapsed time for an interval; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks A執行個體會開始執行，藉由呼叫或。A instance begins running with a call to or . 呼叫以執行執行個體停止或。The instance stops running with a call to or .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Reset() cil managed

summary.span: 停止時間間隔測量並將已耗用時間重設為零。

span.span: Stops time interval measurement and resets the elapsed time to zero.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A執行個體計算，並會累積的耗用時間保留跨多個時間間隔，重設執行個體。A instance calculates and retains the cumulative elapsed time across multiple time intervals, until the instance is reset. 使用停止目前的時間間隔測量並保留累積的經過時間值。Use to stop the current interval measurement and retain the cumulative elapsed time value. 使用停止任何正在進行中的間隔測量並清除 經過時間值。Use to stop any interval measurement in progress and clear the elapsed time value.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Restart() cil managed

summary.span: 停止時間間隔測量，並將耗用時間重設為零，然後開始測量耗用時間。

span.span: Stops time interval measurement, resets the elapsed time to zero, and starts measuring elapsed time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A執行個體計算，並跨多個時間間隔，保留累積的經過時間，直到重設或重新啟動執行個體。A instance calculates and retains the cumulative elapsed time across multiple time intervals, until the instance is reset or restarted. 使用停止目前的時間間隔測量並保留累積的經過時間值。Use to stop the current interval measurement and retain the cumulative elapsed time value. 使用停止任何正在進行中的間隔測量並清除 經過時間值。Use to stop any interval measurement in progress and clear the elapsed time value. 使用停止目前的時間間隔測量並啟動新的間隔測量。Use to stop current interval measurement and start a new interval measurement.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Start() cil managed

summary.span: 啟動或繼續測量間隔的已耗用時間。

span.span: Starts, or resumes, measuring elapsed time for an interval.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在典型案例中，您呼叫方法，最後呼叫方法，然後檢查 經過時間使用屬性。In a typical scenario, you call the method, then eventually call the method, and then you check elapsed time using the property. 一旦啟動，計時器會測量目前間隔經過的計時器刻度為單位，直到執行個體已停止或重設。Once started, a timer measures the current interval, in elapsed timer ticks, until the instance is stopped or reset. 啟動也就是已在執行不會變更的計時器狀態或重設已耗用時間屬性。Starting a that is already running does not change the timer state or reset the elapsed time properties. 當執行個體測量一個以上的時間間隔，方法繼續測量與目前的經過時間值的時間。When a instance measures more than one interval, the method resumes measuring time from the current elapsed time value. A執行個體計算，並會累積的耗用時間保留跨多個時間間隔，重設執行個體。A instance calculates and retains the cumulative elapsed time across multiple time intervals, until the instance is reset. 使用方法之前先呼叫以清除所累積的經過時間，以執行個體。Use the method before calling to clear the cumulative elapsed time in a instance. 使用方法和使用單一命令。Use the method to and the with a single command. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用開始測量應用程式的執行時間計時器的方法。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to start a timer that measures the execution time of an application. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.Stopwatch/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.Stopwatch/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch StartNew() cil managed
Public Shared Function StartNew () As Stopwatch

summary.span: 初始化新的 執行個體，將已耗用時間屬性設定為零，然後開始測量已耗用時間。

span.span: Initializes a new instance, sets the elapsed time property to zero, and starts measuring elapsed time.

returns.span: 剛開始測量已耗用時間的 。

span.span: A that has just begun measuring elapsed time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法相當於呼叫建構函式，然後再呼叫新執行個體上。This method is equivalent to calling the constructor and then calling on the new instance. ## Examples 下列範例會使用類別，以測量效能的四個不同的實作，剖析字串的整數。The following example uses the class to measure the performance of four different implementations for parsing an integer from a string. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[StopWatchPerfSample#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StopWatchPerfSample/CPP/source.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[StopWatchPerfSample#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/StopWatchPerfSample/CS/source.cs#4)] [!code-vb[StopWatchPerfSample#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/StopWatchPerfSample/VB/source.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Stop() cil managed

summary.span: 停止測量間隔的已耗用時間。

span.span: Stops measuring elapsed time for an interval.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在典型案例中，您呼叫方法，最後呼叫方法，然後檢查 經過時間使用屬性。In a typical scenario, you call the method, then eventually call the method, and then you check elapsed time using the property. 方法會結束目前的時間間隔測量。The method ends the current time interval measurement. 停止也就是未執行不會變更的計時器狀態或重設已耗用時間屬性。Stopping a that is not running does not change the timer state or reset the elapsed time properties. 當執行個體測量一個以上的時間間隔，方法相當於暫停經過的時間度量。When a instance measures more than one interval, the method is equivalent to pausing the elapsed time measurement. 後續呼叫繼續測量與目前的經過時間值的時間。A subsequent call to resumes measuring time from the current elapsed time value. 使用方法，以清除所累積的經過時間，以執行個體。Use the method to clear the cumulative elapsed time in a instance. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用停止測量應用程式的執行時間計時器的方法。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to stop a timer that measures the execution time of an application. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.Stopwatch/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.Stopwatch/VB/source.vb#1)]
